mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `dobbyisfree`.COUNSEL (MBR_ID, PROD_ID, CATE_ID, TTL, CN, RX) VALUE (#{MBR_ID}, #{PROD_ID}, #{CATE_ID}, #{TTL}, #{CN}, #{RX})

INSERT INTO `dobbyisfree`.BBS_FILE (FILE_ID, BBS_ID, CNSL_ID, NB_ID, NM, PATH, SIZE, TYPE, REG_DTM, UPD_DTM) VALUE (#{FILE_ID}, #{BBS_ID}, #{CNSL_ID}, #{NB_ID}, #{NM}, #{PATH}, #{SIZE}, #{TYPE}, #{REG_DTM}, #{UPD_DTM})
mapper.select: SELECT C.CNSL_ID, C.BBS_ID, C.MBR_ID, C.CATE_ID, C.PROD_ID, C.TTL, C.CN , C.RX, C.REG_DTM, C.STUS, C.ANS_YN, BC.CATE_NM, P.PROD_NM, A.ANS_ID, A.CNSL_ID, A.CONTENT, A.WRTR, A.REGISTER_DTM , A.RMK FROM `dobbyisfree`.COUNSEL C LEFT JOIN `dobbyisfree`.ANSWER A ON C.CNSL_ID = A.CNSL_ID LEFT JOIN `dobbyisfree`.BBS_CATEGORY BC ON C.CATE_ID = BC.CATE_ID LEFT JOIN `dobbyisfree`.PROD P ON C.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID WHERE C.MBR_ID = #{MBR_ID} ORDER BY C.CNSL_ID DESC

SELECT C.CNSL_ID, C.BBS_ID, C.MBR_ID, C.CATE_ID, C.PROD_ID, C.TTL, C.CN , C.RX, C.REG_DTM, C.STUS, C.ANS_YN, BC.CATE_NM, P.PROD_NM, A.ANS_ID, A.CNSL_ID, A.CONTENT, A.WRTR, A.REGISTER_DTM , A.RMK FROM `dobbyisfree`.COUNSEL C LEFT JOIN `dobbyisfree`.ANSWER A ON C.CNSL_ID = A.CNSL_ID LEFT JOIN `dobbyisfree`.BBS_CATEGORY BC ON C.CATE_ID = BC.CATE_ID LEFT JOIN `dobbyisfree`.PROD P ON C.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID ORDER BY C.CNSL_ID DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{pageSize}
